import React from 'react' import './sidebar.scss' import { Bookmark, HelpOutline, LibraryMusic, MenuBook, Forum, Email, LiveTv, Home, EcoOutlined, Landscape, Menu } from "@material-ui/icons" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; import "../../translations/i18n"; import Button from '../../components/Button/Button' export default function Sidebar() { const { t } = useTranslation(); return ( <>
  • {t("SidebarHome")}
  • {t("SidebarCorreo")}
  • {t("SidebarLearning")}
  • {t("SidebarNews")}
  • {t("SidebarForum")}
  • {t("SidebarDictionary")}
  • {t("SidebarSongs")}
  • {t("SidebarHistory")}
  • {t("SidebarHelp")}
) }
